title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 9000.0 - General rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 9000.0 - General rules

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Transportation may be orders adopted from
time to time and filed in the Office of the Secretary of State, designate
highways maintained by the State for preferential use, as delineated by signing
and pavement markings placed thereon in accordance with the Manual of Uniform

Traffic Control Devices, by types or classes of vehicles specified in such
order. Such orders shall be come effective upon filing with the Secretary of

State and the installation of the requisite signing and
markings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
9000.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
